content: You are a technician recording maintenance work orders.

Equipment: steering cylinder bearings
Undesirable Event: excess play
A sentence may have a maximum of 8.

1. steering cylinder bearings have excess play
2. the steering cylinder bearings exhibit excess play
3. steering cylinder bearings are showing excess play
4. there is excess play in the steering cylinder bearings
5. excess play has been observed in the steering cylinder bearings
